PMH_LOCK_V1.description: Artifact required after GSEP Stage 3 (Empirical Proofing). Contains empirical traces and simulation metadata, essential for S-01 calculation.
PMH_LOCK_V1.cryptographic_requirement: SHA-256 integrity hash of trace data; ECDSA signature by PSR and ATM, confirming mutual calculation acceptance.

DSCM_LOCK_V1.description: Artifact required after GSEP Stage 4 (Decisional Adjudication). Captures the state of all P-01 vector inputs and the irreversible decision result.
DSCM_LOCK_V1.cryptographic_requirement: Merkle root generation covering S-01, S-02, and S-03 inputs; GCO private key signature locking the final P-01 decision and inputs.
